.. js:module:: Dashboard

Dashboard Component
===================

The main dashboard component that displays projects and provides navigation.

Example usage:
--------------

.. code-block:: jsx

   <Dashboard />

Returns
-------

:literal:`JSX.Element` - Rendered Dashboard component.

Props
-----

- ``props``: Additional properties that can be passed to the Dashboard component.

  *Note: The component currently does not utilize any props.*

Functions
---------

- ``handleRowClick(row)``: Handles the click event on a row in the ProjectsTable.

- ``handleCloseEditDialog()``: Handles the close event of the EditProjectDialog.

- ``handleLogout()``: Handles the logout functionality, making a GET request to the "/api/logout" endpoint.

  *Note: Requires proper authorization in the headers.*

Effects
-------

- ``fetchProjects()``: Function to fetch projects making a GET request to the "/api/list_projects" endpoint.

  *Note: Requires proper authorization in the headers.*

  *Note: Invoked when the Dashboard component is mounted.*

- ``useEffect`` hook: Invokes ``fetchProjects()`` when the Dashboard component is mounted.

- ``useEffect`` hook: Invokes ``fetchProjects()`` when ``shouldListProjects`` is set to true.

Components
----------

- ``ProjectsTable``: A component that displays projects in a table format.

- ``CreateProjectDialog``: A component for creating a new project.

- ``EditProjectDialog``: A component for editing an existing project.

Hooks
-----

- ``useNavigate``: A hook from "react-router-dom" for programmatic navigation.

- ``useSnackbar``: A hook from "notistack" for displaying snackbars.

Materials-UI Components
-----------------------

- ``createTheme``: A function from "@mui/material/styles" for creating a theme.

- ``ThemeProvider``: A component from "@mui/material/styles" for providing the theme to the component tree.

- ``CssBaseline``: A component from "@mui/material" for applying global styles to the document.

- ``Box``: A component from "@mui/material" for creating a box layout.

- ``Button``: A component from "@mui/material" for creating a button.

- ``AppBar``: A component from "@mui/material" for creating an app bar.

- ``Toolbar``: A component from "@mui/material" for creating a toolbar.

- ``Typography``: A component from "@mui/material" for creating typography.

- ``Container``: A component from "@mui/material" for creating a container.

- ``Grid``: A component from "@mui/material" for creating a grid layout.

- ``Paper``: A component from "@mui/material" for creating a paper container.

- ``Link``: A component from "@mui/material" for creating a link.

- ``ThemeProvider``: A component from "@mui/material/styles" for providing the theme to the component tree.

- ``Slide``: A component from "@mui/material" for creating a slide transition.

  *Note: Some components may be imported from "@mui/system" or other specific paths.*

Components and Hooks
--------------------

- ``ProjectsTable``: A component that displays projects in a table format.

- ``CreateProjectDialog``: A component for creating a new project.

- ``EditProjectDialog``: A component for editing an existing project.

- ``Copyright``: A component for displaying copyright information.

- ``useNavigate``: A hook from "react-router-dom" for programmatic navigation.

- ``useSnackbar``: A hook from "notistack" for displaying snackbars.
